StartRoom.LookWest: You find Nothing but a bare stone wall
StartRoom.LookEast: You find a table and a chest against a wall with a small window

EastSideRoom.InspectWindow: You look out the window and see nothing but a mountains covered in snow

StartRoom.LookNorth: You see a big metal door

NorthSideRoom.InspectDoor_NoKey: The door does not budge. There seems to be a key hole
NorthSideRoom.InspectDoor_WithKey: Maybe this key will unlock the door
NorthSideRoom.TryUnlockDoor_NoKey: I have nothing to unlock the door with
NorthSideRoom.TryUnlockDoor_WithKey: I put the key in the door and it clicks open
NorthSideRoom.TryOpenDoor_Unlocked: The door swung open, I can walk through now
NorthSideRoom.TryOpenDoor_locked: The door must be locked, there must be a key somewhere in this room. I should search the room

StartRoom.LookSouth: There's chains hanging from the wall. I wonder why they didn't put me in those

ForkedHallway.LookNorth: You see a big door with an intimidating skull on it

NorthSideRoom.InspectDoor_Nokey: It looks like something should be put into the eyes of the skull. I wonder if that will open it
NorthSideRoom.InspectDoor_WithKey: I should try seeing what the keys do when I put them in the eyes
NorthSideRoom.TryUnlockDoor_NoKey: I should find both keys first
NorthSideRoom.TryUnlockDoor_WithKey: The skull begins the glow and vibrate. The jaw seems to be slowly opening and I think I see a hole behind it
NorthSideRoom.InspectJawHole: I can't see anything in the hole. It looks about the size of my hand though.
NorthSideRoom.PutHandInJawHole: I feel a knob and it seems like it can twist
NorthSideRoom.TryOpenDoor: I hear several clicks and bangs but the door seems to be opening on its own now

ForkedHallway.LookWest: You see a wood door with light peaking through the cracked between the boards

WestSideRoom.InspectDoor: The door seems to barely be standing, I can see the other room but I can't see whats in it. I don't think it's locked
WestSideRoom.TryOpenDoor: The door squeals as it opens

ForkedHallway.LookEast: You see a rickety wooden door leaning slightly in its frame.

EastSideRoom.InspectDoor: The door looks to barely be standing. Shouldn't be hard to open
EastSideRoom.TryOpenDoor: The door was a little jamed but a good tug made the door swing open

ForkedHallway.LookSouth: There's the door to the room I woke up in

SouthSideRoom.InspectDoor: The metal door is a little rusty on this side but still unlocked
